LanguageData.VWE_Anesthetic.label: 麻醉剂
LanguageData.VWE_Anesthetic.description: 流淌在血液中的睡眠药物。麻醉剂会使生物失去知觉。
LanguageData.VWE_Anesthetic.stages.wearing_off.label: 消退
LanguageData.VWE_Anesthetic.stages.woozy.label: 昏沉
LanguageData.VWE_Anesthetic.stages.sedated.label: 镇静
LanguageData.VWE_TearGas.label: 催泪瓦斯
LanguageData.VWE_TearGas.description: 催泪瓦斯会使眼睛和鼻子产生灼烧感，并让受害者的视力完全丧失。
LanguageData.VWE_TearGas.stages.wearing_off.label: 消退
LanguageData.VWE_TearGas.stages.teary.label: 流泪
LanguageData.VWE_TearGas.stages.blinded.label: 致盲
